preqs: Students must have passed AFF2401, BFF2401, BFW2401 or AFW2401 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AFF3841%, AFW3841, BFF3841, DEB384, DEB3841%, FIN260CC, FIN380, FIN384, FIN3841}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFF2401, AFW2401, BFF2401, BFW2401} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Lending environment; decision making and organisation of lending, lending policies and controls; behavioural aspects of decision making and decision makers; retail, commercial and corporate lending; business expansions; off balance sheet lending; loan management and problem loans.
